2024/11/2 Notice to All The Fourth Pre-sale of Tyevat Chronicle Ended on November 2 â€‹

The fourth pre-sale of Tyevat Chronicle ended at midnight on November 2. Starting today, the price of Tyevat Chronicle is officially adjusted to Â¥26.8. For those who purchased the book during the fourth batch (10.6-11.2), the Â¥8.8 Genlogy coupon is now available for redemption. Travelers can visit http://tics.top/shop/twtbns/help for more details. Regarding order inquiries and book shipping issues, the website mentioned above (available since late August) can be used to track and update logistics progress in real time. Thank you for your continued support!

2024/10/12 Notice to All TIEQ 2025 Winter Simulated Exam Notification â€‹

The TIEQ is scheduled to conduct the First Public Simulated Exam during the 2025 winter break. The subjects include Chinese, Mathematics, History, and Biology, with A and B versions of each paper. The exam will be conducted through questionnaires and further details, including the date, will be announced later. The paper creation and grading will be managed by the Test Research Division.

If anyone has Tyevat-related test questions, you are welcome to submit them via QQ: FreedomLikeWind (340533858) or email: TICS-TIEQ@outlook.com. Please specify the source of your questions. (QQ online hours: Saturday 5 PM to Sunday 3 PM)
(The final interpretation of this test belongs to the Tyevat Institute of Cultural Science Test Research Division.)

2024/10/10 Notice to All End of Mainstream Lifecycle for the Old Official Website â€‹

Since its delivery on July 3, 2024, the old website has published 16 articles and recieved dozens of comments. Due to increasing service demands, the Operations and Publicity Department has decided to terminate the mainstream support lifecycle of the old WordPress website. Articles will no longer be published on the old site. Users are encouraged to migrate to the new official website:

http://next.tics.top

  • Start Date: July 3, 2024
  • Mainstream Support Termination: October 8, 2024
  • Extended Support: Long-term

Operations and Publicity Department of Tyevat Institute of Cultural Science
WhoTao
October 8, 2024

2024/10/6 Notice to Fans Announcement on Tyevat Chronicle Order Inquiries and After-sales Issues â€‹

To help travelers process inquiries and orders efficiently, we are providing the following details:

(1) Order Information Inquiry
Orders placed since late August for Tyevat Chronicle have been recorded. Travelers can visit http://tics.top/shop/twtbns/cd and use the phone number provided during purchase to check their order status.
For orders placed before mid-August, all books have been shipped and delivered. If you have not received your package, please contact after-sales support.

(2) After-sales Support
For any other issues or questions regarding orders, please contact QQ: 3793868382.
Thank you for supporting the book sales!

2024/9/28 Internal Notice Launch of Tyevat Institute File Storage Server â€‹

Introduction
To better support internal operations, the Tyevat Institute of Cultural Science has launched a file storage server to provide safer, more efficient, and convenient file storage and management services, ensuring the long-term preservation and sharing of documents.

Usage Instructions
Download the â€œTyevat Institute File Storage Server.exeâ€ from the group files. Open it and use the account name "é€šç”¨è´¦æˆ·" and the password "tics.top".
Note: This account is for file downloads only. To upload or modify files, please contact @WhoTao for authorization.

Important Notes
Strictly adhere to the institute's file storage and information security management regulations. Do not leak confidential documents.

Operations and Publicity Department of Tyevat Institute of Cultural Science
September 14, 2024

2024/8/27 Third Pre-sale of Tyevat Chronicle â€‹

To all researchers and fans,

Following the success of the first and second pre-sale batches of Tyevat Chronicle (July 27 and August 16), which met their sales targets, the official purchase channels were temporarily closed to ensure timely delivery. Currently, all books from the first and second batches have been shipped and received, with positive feedback.

To allow more travelers to explore Tyevat's history and to accommodate those who missed the earlier pre-sales, the third batch of Tyevat Chronicle pre-sales will begin on August 27, 2024, at 7:00 PM.

  • Quantity: Limited to 400 copies (first come, first served).
  • Payment: Online platform (WeChat and Alipay supported).
  • Shipping: Expected delivery from late September to early October.

The purchase link will be shared in the group chat. Thank you for your continued support!

2024/7/17 Apology to All Members â€‹

Dear group members (fans),

After reviewing last nightâ€™s chat records, group exits, and feedback, I deeply reflected on the issues. I realize that the fan group should be a space for fans to interact, but there were too many rules causing restrictions. Here are the adjustments:

1. Simplified Group Rules
(1) No discussions involving politics.
(2) No explicit content.
(3) No personal insults or arguments.
(4) Avoid unnecessary spamming; violators will be muted.
(5) Everyone is equalâ€”group owner, admin, or member.

2. Regarding Last Night's Incident
I am angry about the malicious insults and regretful for those who left the group. Administrators must enforce equality; repeated violations will result in removal, and new admins will be selected.

3. Conclusion
I apologize for my delay in addressing this. Thank you all for your support and attention!

Sincerely,

2024/7/11 Notification on Preparing for the 2024 First Semester Final Exam â€‹

To all responsible personnel,

The first semester final exam is scheduled for January 26, 2025. Due to time constraints, please ensure the following:

  1. Submit test papers + answer sheets (unlimited pages).
  2. If there are listening components, include them with the test papers.
  3. Follow the test paper layout:
    • Title (e.g., Miyoushi 2024 First Semester Exam / Tyevat Chronicle Test / "Answer Sheet")
    • Structure: Title + Instructions
    • Paper I: Multiple-choice questions
    • Paper II: Non-multiple-choice questions (Listening sections come first, if applicable).
    • Answer Sheet: Title + Info Area + Candidate Instructions

Ensure clear layout divisions for the answer areas: multiple-choice sections for card-filling, and other sections for written answers.

July 11, 2024

2024/7/11 TEP Division Tyevat Historical Research Institute (TIH) Joins Bilibili â€‹

TIH, TEP, focuses on compiling and publishing historical works. The Tyevat Chronicle is now officially translated as Tyevat Chronicle in English.
